name: Max Thunder Power Slide Simulator
description:
Like Streets of Rage but wish you could just UTTERLY BULLDOSE EVERYTHING? Well Max Thunder has heard your prayers! Slide through the streets at 600 mph as everything(except the things that can kill you) yields to your powers.

Use the arrow keys to move and A and S to slow down and speed up!

For inquiries, feel free to hit me up at https://twitter.com/bigbeandotgov
